Package ra.util.logging

Class LogRecord

java.lang.Object
ra.util.logging.LogRecord
public class LogRecord
extends java.lang.Object
Create a file which be used to write Log. the following action: Keep the file I/O connection and will not close the file I/O connection when writing log into a file, after creating the Log file by earmark file name.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static interface  LogRecord.OnNotEnoughSpaceListener
    It will be called on, when has not enough storage space remaining.
